name: Bubble Rainbow Free
description:
Save Yourself from the Bubble Onslaught in Bubble Rainbow!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mWCsRyiWXiM

Bubble Rainbow Captures All the Fun of Popping Bubbles with None of the Mess or Searing Eyeball Pain.

Bubble Rainbow tasks players with fending off a vicious attack of soapy bubbles hell-bent on getting into eyes and anywhere else they might cause harm. The menacing grins on the bubbles assure all of their evil intentions, and it's up to the player and the trusty Rubber Ducky to save the day.

They must be popped at any cost!

Bubble Rainbow Free is an endless Time Challenge! For a full featured bubble experience, upgrade to Bubble Rainbow Pro!
